features: OIL-BASED CLEANSER: Without any harsh surfactants, this luxurious Mad Hippie face wash easily melts away impurities, dirt, and makeup while protecting your skin’s natural acid mantle.
NOURISHING FACE CLEANSER: The soothing jelly, packed with nutrients and essential fatty acids from sea buckthorn berry, glides effortlessly across your skin for a luxurious cleansing experience.
ANTI-AGING SKIN CARE: The addition of antioxidants green tea, white tea, rose, resveratrol, and chamomile, helps to protect your skin from environmental stressors and promote a youthful complexion.

SUITABLE FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: The Mad Hippie Jelly Cleanser is suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin and aging skin, as it is free from harsh chemicals, parabens, sulfates, and synthetic fragrances.
MAD HIPPIE MAKES BEAUTIFUL & COMPLETE SKIN CARE: Non-GMO, cruelty-free, and vegan, our advanced skin care products transform your skin through the power of nature.
body.description: Hydrating, mildly acidic jelly-to-milk cleanser with an antioxidant boost! Melt away dirt, impurities & bad vibes without disrupting the skin's natural acid mantle. Remove makeup, excess oil, and grime that rinses away without residue, leaving skin soft and clean. Our Jelly Cleanser has a gentle formula that is appropriate for all skin types. Featuring: Hyaluronic Acid – A moisture-binding natural active, hyaluronic acid supports deep hydration. Sodium PCA – Derived from amino acids, sodium PCA is a naturally occurring humectant in the skin with high water absorbing qualities. Works to effectively hydrate the skin by absorbing and binding moisture to the skin. Sea Buckthorn Berry – This berry native to the Tibetan Himalayas, is rich in skin supporting vitamins. Rose – Rich in antioxidants & minerals, rose acts as a gentle astringent. White Tea – Delicately harvested new growth tea leaves rich in antioxidants. Chamomile – This calming, antioxidant-rich herb soothes the skin, and helps reduce the appearance of redness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells rosy and leaves skin hydrated
reviews.reviewText: I love this face wash. Clean ingredients and it also is packaged in a way that the cap opening distributes just enough product. Only need a dime size amount so it's going to last a long time. Smells like roses and leaves skin soft and hydrated like applying a light facial oil as you cleanse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars After years of searching for good natural products, I've found Mad hippie!
reviews.reviewText: I have grown up with troublesome skin. My first step in solving this was switching to natural products. I noticed switching to natural products took away a lot of redness on my face but I still was not satisfied with most products. After years of going through every natural product brand, I found mad hippie. I really like how simple the ingredients are and how clean it smells without harsh chemicals. It is gentle on my skin and removes all makeup and debris. Mad hippie was the first brand I confidently have repurchased multiple times.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Use as makeup remover!
reviews.reviewText: I use this along with their cleansing oil to remove my makeup. It works incredible for that purpose! I massage it on top of my makeup and use it like a cleansing balm, along with mad hippie cleansing oil and let it sit on my face for about 5 minutes. My makeup melts off! And the best part is my skin IS SOOO SOFT and hydrated feeling afterwards. I’ll be honest I didn’t like using it as a cleanser by itself to I use it as a cleansing balm for makeup! Works great for that ☺️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: One of the best facial cleansing products I've tried..I love Mad Hippie products!!! Other thing I love about them is that they are cruelty free!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I love the softness of my skin.
reviews.reviewText: It made me break out into rosacea which I have not had in five years so I stopped using it immediately. I really liked the way it made my skin feel so I was bummed that it made me break out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very clean face alert!
reviews.reviewText: I just love how smooth and transparent this product is. A little big goes a long way. I feel great about using it on my skin. I keep buying it and giving it as gifts to others. Great quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hydrates mature skin
reviews.reviewText: I’m very impressed with this cleanser. Very hydrating for mature skin. The scent is good too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have enjoyed all your products. This js the first product that has caused much irrataion on my face. I tried to like this product but it too harsh .

My new favourite facial cleanser! Highly recommend. I have mast cell activation syndrome and have a hard time finding products that I don’t get hives from or react to but this one works great likely because of the natural ingredients.
Great for sensitive skin. Removes make up well. Has a nice smell. Does in fact hydrate.
